title: Collaborative Learning-Based Blended Learning Design: Short-Intensive Course in Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Environment requiring asynchronous collaboration and self-directed learning using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can complete 80% or more of a social phenomenon analysis project using collaborative learning strategies in an asynchronous online environment
Learners can improve a research report at least twice by exchanging peer feedback using blended learning tools
Learners can engage in at least three meaningful interactions on weekly discussion topics in the LMS collaboration board
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
